articles.description: All the latest transfer news as Benjamin Sesko has a medical at Manchester United and Chelsea show interest in Alejandro Garnacho.

articles.description: Aston Villa complete the signing of Nice striker Evann Guessand for £26m plus £4.3m in add-ons.

articles.title: Premier League: Who are most likely to challenge Liverpool this season?

articles.description: Victoria Mboko wins her first WTA title by coming from behind to beat Naomi Osaka in the Canadian Open final.
articles.title: Victoria Mboko beats Naomi Osaka to win maiden WTA title at Canadian Open

articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Fans share their best stories and memories of supporting their club

articles.description: Manchester United look set to complete a third major forward signing in a bid to solve their goalscoring problems - now attention is turning to the midfield.
articles.title: Manchester United transfer news: Carlos Baleba interest highlights midfield need

articles.description: An estimated 12,000 football supporters have been scammed by online ticket fraud in the past two years.
articles.title: Football fans scammed out of estimated £2.5m by "ruthless" fraudsters

articles.description: As usual, Glenn McGrath predicts Australia will win the 2025-26 Ashes 5-0 - but says Joe Root and Harry Brook are the England players the hosts will fear most.
articles.title: Ashes 2025-26: Glenn McGrath predicts 5-0 win for Australia

articles.description: The Premier League is no longer working with LGBTQ+ charity Stonewall or taking part in its Rainbow Laces campaign.
articles.title: Premier League ends partnership with LGBTQ+ charity Stonewall
